question: How to View Agency and Agent Delegations as an Agency Manager
text:
How to View Agency and Agent Delegations as an Agency Manager
          
        


Agency Manager Role


1. Go to agency delegations, active individuals to view the agency book.



2. To view individuals designated to the agent who is also an agent manager select My Delegations/Active Individuals:


3. To create a new app for a consumer not in the book, click on My Delegations, My Dashboard and the Search Existing Consumers:
